Package com.flipfit.dao

Class UserDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.dao.UserDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAOInterface
public class UserDAOImpl extends Object implements UserDAOInterface
Author:
Dhruv Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for user-related operations. This class handles all interactions with the database for user authentication, registration, and profile management for both customers and gym owners.

    • authenticateUser

      public boolean authenticateUser(User user)
      Authenticates a user by checking their email, password, and role against the database.
      Specified by:
      authenticateUser in interface UserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the credentials to be authenticated.
      Returns:
      true if the user's credentials are valid, false otherwise.

    • registerCustomer

      public boolean registerCustomer(Customer customer)
      Registers a new customer by inserting records into both the `GymCustomer` and `User` tables.
      Specified by:
      registerCustomer in interface UserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object containing the registration details.
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false otherwise.

    • registerGymOwner

      public boolean registerGymOwner(GymOwner gymOwner)

      Specified by:
      registerGymOwner in interface UserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - The GymOwner object containing the registration details.
      Returns:

    • editProfile

      public boolean editProfile(Customer customer)
      Edits the profile of an existing customer by updating records in both the `User` and `GymCustomer` tables. This is done within a transaction.
      Specified by:
      editProfile in interface UserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object with the updated details.
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • editGymOwnerDetails

      public void editGymOwnerDetails(GymOwner gymOwnerDetails)
      Edits the profile details of an existing gym owner. Note: This method seems to have an issue, as it uses `customerDetailsUpdateQuery`. The logic should be corrected to update the `GymOwner` table.
      Specified by:
      editGymOwnerDetails in interface UserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerDetails - The GymOwner object with the updated details.

    • getGymOwnerDetails

      public GymOwner getGymOwnerDetails(String gymOwnerEmailId)
      Retrieves the profile details of a gym owner from the database.
      Specified by:
      getGymOwnerDetails in interface UserDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerEmailId - The email ID of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      A GymOwner object containing the profile details.
